title: In a LOS exceeding 400 sq
clause_text: In a LOS exceeding 400 sq. m in area (in one piece), elevated/underground water reservoirs/tanks, electric sub- stations, pump houses, facility for treatment of wet waste in situ may be built and shall not utilize more than 10 per cent of the LOS in which they are located.
